review: Being a MAC / apple guy I was real happy with this purchase as it ties is so nicely my mac with my TV and ipads / iphones. I was a tad disappointed that the built in apps were tied into being a subscriber BUT otherwise it's awesome.  Lastly, if you don't have apple products I wouldn't recommend, ROKU or a Blu Ray player with wifi would be a cheaper solution.
